articles.author: Berkeley Lovelace Jr.
articles.title: For some, Medicare isn't covering the updated Covid vaccine yet - NBC News
articles.description: Some older Americans on Medicare are facing an unexpected problem: The updated Covid shots — approved last month by the Food and Drug Administration for all adults 65 and up — aren’t being covered, forcing them to decide whether to pay out of pocket
